org.apache.hadoop.hbase.wal

Class BoundedLogWriterCreationOutputSink

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.wal.OutputSink
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.wal.LogRecoveredEditsOutputSink
        • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.wal.BoundedLogWriterCreationOutputSink

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class BoundedLogWriterCreationOutputSink
extends LogRecoveredEditsOutputSink
    Class that manages the output streams from the log splitting process. Bounded means the output streams will be no more than the size of threadpool

    • Nested Class Summary

      • getOutputCounts

        public Map<byte[],Long> getOutputCounts()
        since the splitting process may create multiple output files, we need a map regionRecoverStatMap to track the output count of each region.
        Overrides:
        getOutputCounts in class LogRecoveredEditsOutputSink
        Returns:
        a map from encoded region ID to the number of edits written out for that region.
